insertions.reason: Visual reinforces: "Hum roz jo khana khate hain, uski quality pe hum rarely dhyaan dete hain."
Visual reinforces: "Street food aur takeaway humari daily life ka hissa ban chuka hai."
Visual reinforces: "Par hygiene aur cleanliness ko hum aksar ignore kar dete hain."
Visual reinforces: "Agar hum thoda conscious banein, better choices possible hain."
